item.title: By: dreeves
item.dc:creator: dreeves
item.description: Thanks Dave and Basil! For email snoozing, I used a concoction of perl, pine, and procmail. I'm finally phasing that system out and working on a replacement. See /email for more about that -- I amended the article with a collection of modern tools I've tried out with gmail.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Dave and Basil! For email snoozing, I used a concoction of perl, pine, and procmail. I’m finally phasing that system out and working on a replacement. See /email for more about that — I amended the article with a collection of modern tools I’ve tried out with gmail.

item.title: By: Basil
item.dc:creator: Basil
item.description: GREAT EMAIL! How can you have something sent to yourself at a later date? Great photo as well for the blog title. Just like the movie when he gets the telegram from the Doc.
item.content:encoded: GREAT EMAIL! How can you have something sent to yourself at a later date? Great photo as well for the blog title. Just like the movie when he gets the telegram from the Doc.

item.title: By: David Pennock
item.dc:creator: David Pennock
item.description: This is a gem. Too bad you can't forward it to your 12-year-ago self with some hindsight included.
item.content:encoded: This is a gem. Too bad you can’t forward it to your 12-year-ago self with some hindsight included.
